```{r}
library(rio)
import("Pollution index.xlsx")
str(Pollution_index)
boxplot(Pollution_index[,c('particlePollution')])
#trying standardization
Pollution_index$particlePollution_S=as.vector(scale(Pollution_index$particlePollution))
set.seed(123)
library(cluster)
vars=c('particlePollution_S')#variables needed

distMatrix=cluster::daisy(Pollution_index[,vars])
        
res.pam=cluster::pam(x=distMatrix,
                     k = 3,
                     cluster.only = F)
Pollution_index$cluster=as.factor(res.pam$clustering)







```
